text: Northwestern College is in Saint Paul, Minnesota. It is a four-year Christian college. The school was founded on October 2, 1902. Billy Graham was the school's president from 1948 to 1952. Athletic teams at the school are known as Eagles. Category:Colleges and universities in Minnesota Category:Council for Christian Colleges and Universities Category:Saint Paul, Minnesota Category:1902 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Minnesota
title: Northwestern College
